snippet: While shares of the hottest initial public offerings go almost entirely to Wall Street banks that oversee the stock sale, Facebook has discussed raising the number of shares that will go to retail investors.
abstract: While shares of the hottest initial public offerings go almost entirely to Wall Street banks that oversee the stock sale, Facebook has discussed raising the number of shares that will go to retail investors.

byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and EVELYN M. RUSLI

headline.main: Small Investors May Get to Own a Bit of Facebook
headline.print_headline: Small Investors May Get To Own Bit Of Facebook
